00011         if (sender)
00012                 delete sender;

00015 Connection::Connection(BindType t, Queue<Data*> *q) {
00016         reciver = NULL;
00017         sender = NULL;
00018         type = t;
00019         in = q;
00020         out = new Queue<Data*> ();

00023 std::string ServerProcessor::GetCurrentClientsInfo() {
00024 
00025         std::string ret;
00026         AutoMutex a(clientsMtx);
00027         std::map<std::string, ClientConnection*>::iterator it = clients.begin();
00028 
00029         while (it != clients.end()) {
00030                 ClientConnection* clnt = it->second;
00031                 if (clnt->rv != NULL) {
00032                         ret.append(std::string("system id: ") + it->first + std::string(
00033                                         "\ttype: Receiver\n"));
00034                 }
00035                 if (clnt->tx != NULL) {
00036                         ret.append(std::string("system id: ") + it->first + std::string(
00037                                         "\ttype: Transceiver\n"));
00038                 }
00039                 if (clnt->tm != NULL) {
00040                         ret.append(std::string("system id: ") + it->first + std::string(
00041                                         "\ttype: Transmitter\n"));
00042                 }
00043                 it++;
00044         }
00045 
00046         return ret;
00047 
00048 }

00050 void ServerProcessor::SendData(Data* data) {
00051 
00052         //      const char* dataContext = data->context.c_str();
00053 
00054         Queue<Data*>* q = NULL;
00055         ClientConnection* clntConn = GetClient(data->systemId);
00056         if (clntConn == NULL) {
00057                 m_logger->warn("has no client with such system id %s",
00058                                 data->systemId.c_str());
00059                 return;
00060         }
00061 
00062         if (clntConn->rv != NULL) {
00063                 q = clntConn->rv->out;
00064         } else if (clntConn->tx != NULL) {
00065                 q = clntConn->tx->out;
00066         } else {
00067                 m_logger->warn("can't send deliver sm. has no appropriate connection");
00068                 return;
00069         }
00070         q->push(data);
00071 
00072 }
00073 
00074 void ServerProcessor::runLoop() {
00075         int res;
00076         unsigned long sn;
00077         std::map<unsigned long, Request*>::iterator it;
00078 
00079         Data* data = inQ->pop();
00080         if (data == NULL) {
00081                 usleep(1);
00082                 return;
00083         }
00084 
00085         switch (data->hdr->command_id()) {
00086         case Smpp::CommandId::DeliverSm:
00087 
00088                 m_logger->debug("Recv Deliver sm pdu");
00089                 sn = GetSeqNum();
00090                 data->hdr->sequence_number(sn);
00091                 m_reqMap[sn] = data->req;
00092                 data->req = NULL;
00093                 SendData(data);
00094                 m_logger->trace("Processor send Deliver sm pdu");
00095                 break;
00096         case Smpp::CommandId::SubmitSm:
00097 
00098                 m_logger->trace("Processor recv Submit sm pdu");
00099                 if (!GetMessage(data)) {
00100                         res = 0;
00101                         if (data->udhTotal) {
00102                                 res = ProcessMP(data);
00103                         }
00104                         if (!res) {
00105                                 m_logger->debug("Processor send Submit sm msg to user");
00106                                 userQ->push(data);
00107                         }
00108                 } else {
00109                         MT_LOGTRACE("can't process pdu");
00110                         delete data;
00111                 }
00112                 break;
00113 
00114         default:
00115                 MT_LOGWARNING("can't find such command_id: "<<data->hdr->command_id())
00116                 break;
00117         }
00118 
00119         return;
00120 }

00125 int ServerProcessor::GetMessage(Data* data) {
00126         Smpp::SubmitSm* pdu = (Smpp::SubmitSm*) data->hdr;
00127 
00128         Message* msg = new Message();
00129         Smpp::SmeAddress smeSrcAddr = pdu->source_addr();
00130         Smpp::SmeAddress smeDstAddr = pdu->destination_addr();
00131         CodecPtr cdc;
00132         msg->type = SMS;
00133         msg->from = smeSrcAddr.address();
00134         msg->to = smeDstAddr.address();
00135 
00136         Smpp::ShortMessage sm = pdu->short_message();
00137 
00138         msg->registeredDelivery = pdu->registered_delivery();
00139         msg->codingScheme = smppHelper->getCodingScheme(pdu);
00140         smppHelper->getMessage(pdu, msg->body);
00141 
00142         if (msg->registeredDelivery) {
00143                 msg->context = data->msgId + " ";
00144         }
00145 
00146         data->msg = msg;
00147 
00148         return 0;
00149 }

00151 void* ServerProcessor::ConnectionsMonitor(void* p) {
00152         ServerProcessor* proc = (ServerProcessor*) p;
00153         LoggerPtr logger = LoggerFactory::instance()->createLogger(
00154                         "Active Connections");
00155         while (1) {
00156                 sleep(3);
00157                 std::string body = proc->GetCurrentClientsInfo();
00158                 if (body.length() == 0) {
00159                         body = "no clients\n";
00160                 }
00161                 logger->info("\n-------------------\n%s-------------------",
00162                                 body.c_str());
00163         }
00164 
00165         return NULL;
00166 
00167 }
